2+1.name: SERSI
2+1.sig_info: While Sersi’s Glancing Buff is active, Glanced hits grant a Regeneration Buff healing 5 to 13% of damage taken per Transmutation over 3 seconds. This ability activates before checking Armor and Resistances and cannot be triggered by Blocking. Transmutation Buffs that exceed the maximum do not count towards this ability.
